name: Pesticide Action Network UK
goal:
Pesticide Action Network UK (PAN UK) is the only UK charity focused on tackling the problems caused by pesticides and promoting safe and sustainable alternatives to pesticides in agriculture, urban areas, homes and gardens.

Our work includes campaigning for change in policy and practices at home and overseas, co-ordinating projects in the developing world which help smallholder farming communities escape ill-health and poverty caused by pesticides, and contributing our wealth of scientific and technical expertise to the work of other organisations who share our aims.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives: All issues relating to pesticides, biocides and sustainable agriculture. Also interested in CAP reform, chemical legislation and human health issues related to pesticides
